html: On Friday, I voted against the omnibus appropriations bill for many reasons. I think it is ridiculous to increase federal spending when Our Nation has just exceeded 20 trillion dollars in debt. Our bloated government spending today increases the burden on generations tomorrow.
text:
On Friday, I voted against the omnibus appropriations bill for many reasons.
I think it is ridiculous to increase federal spending when Our Nation has just exceeded 20 trillion dollars in debt. Our bloated government spending today increases the burden on generations tomorrow.
